languages.text: This creature has its {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} reduced by −2. Also, at the start of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the creature has to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If passed, it suffers <u>(from 12 to 16)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}, and this {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} is removed. If failed, it suffers <u>(from 16 to 24)</u> fire {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and continues suffering this negative effect.

traits.locale_text: This creature has its {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} reduced by −2. Also, at the start of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the creature has to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If passed, it suffers <u>(from 12 to 16)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}, and this {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} is removed. If failed, it suffers <u>(from 16 to 24)</u> fire {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and continues suffering this negative effect.

This creature has its {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} reduced by −2. Also, at the start of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the creature has to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If passed, it suffers <u>(from 12 to 16)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}, and this {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} is removed. If failed, it suffers <u>(from 16 to 24)</u> fire {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and continues suffering this negative effect.

This creature has its {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} reduced by −2. Also, at the start of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the creature has to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. If passed, it suffers <u>(from 12 to 16)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}, and this {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} is removed. If failed, it suffers <u>(from 16 to 24)</u> fire {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and continues suffering this negative effect.

languages.text: Число {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} существа уменьшается на 2. В начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} оно выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}. В случае успеха существо получает <u>(от 12 до 16)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненного урона{/g}, а этот {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативный эффект{/g} снимается. В случае провала оно получает <u>(от 16 до 24)</u> огненного {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}, при этом негативный эффект сохраняется.
languages.original_text: This creature has its {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} reduced by −2. Also, at the start of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the creature has to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If passed, it suffers <u>(from 12 to 16)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}, and this {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} is removed. If failed, it suffers <u>(from 16 to 24)</u> fire {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and continues suffering this negative effect.

traits.locale_text: Число ОД и ОП существа уменьшается на 2. В начале своего хода оно выполняет проверку Выносливости на сопротивление. В случае успеха существо получает <u>(от 12 до 16)</u> огненного урона, а этот негативный эффект снимается. В случае провала оно получает <u>(от 16 до 24)</u> огненного урона, при этом негативный эффект сохраняется.

Число ОД и ОП существа уменьшается на 2. В начале своего хода оно выполняет проверку Выносливости на сопротивление. В случае успеха существо получает <u>(от 12 до 16)</u> огненного урона, а этот негативный эффект снимается. В случае провала оно получает <u>(от 16 до 24)</u> огненного урона, при этом негативный эффект сохраняется.

languages.text: この生物は−2減少された{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}および{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を持っている。また、{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の開始時に、この生物は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に合格しなければならない。合格した場合、<u>12～16</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火災被害{/g}を負い、この{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}マイナス効果{/g}は取り除かれる。失格した場合、<u>16～24</u>の火災{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}被害{/g}を負い、このマイナス効果を継続して負う。
languages.original_text: This creature has its {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} reduced by −2. Also, at the start of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the creature has to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If passed, it suffers <u>(from 12 to 16)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}, and this {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} is removed. If failed, it suffers <u>(from 16 to 24)</u> fire {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and continues suffering this negative effect.

traits.locale_text: この生物のAPおよびMPは2減少する。また、ターン開始時に、この生物は耐久力抵抗テストに合格しなければならない。合格した場合、12～16の炎ダメージを負い、このマイナス効果は取り除かれる。失格した場合、16～24の炎ダメージを負い、このマイナス効果は継続する。

この生物は−2減少された{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}および{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を持っている。また、{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の開始時に、この生物は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}抵抗判定{/g}に合格しなければならない。合格した場合、<u>12～16</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火災被害{/g}を負い、この{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}マイナス効果{/g}は取り除かれる。失格した場合、<u>16～24</u>の火災{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}被害{/g}を負い、このマイナス{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}を継続して負う。

languages.text: 此生物的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}降低2点。每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，此生物需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}。若目标通过检定，则会受到<u>12-16</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}，并移除此{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}负面效果{/g}。若目标未能通过检定，则会受到<u>16-24</u>点火焰{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，并继续受此负面效果影响。
languages.original_text: This creature has its {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} reduced by −2. Also, at the start of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the creature has to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If passed, it suffers <u>(from 12 to 16)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}, and this {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} is removed. If failed, it suffers <u>(from 16 to 24)</u> fire {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and continues suffering this negative effect.

traits.locale_text: 此生物的行动点数与移动点数降低2点。每回合开始时，此生物需要进行坚韧抗性检定。若目标通过检定，则会受到12-16点火焰伤害，并移除此负面效果。若目标未能通过检定，则会受到16-24点火焰伤害，并继续受此负面效果影响。

此生物的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}降低2点。每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，此生物需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}。若目标通过检定，则会受到<u>12-16</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}，并移除此{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}负面效果{/g}。若目标未能通过检定，则会受到<u>16-24</u>点火焰{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，并继续受此负面{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}影响。

languages.text: Los {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} de la criatura se reducen en −2. Además, al principio de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} debe realizar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}. Si la supera, sufre <u>(de 12 a 16)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}daño por fuego{/g} y este {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}efecto negativo{/g} se elimina. Si falla, sufre <u>(de 16 a 24)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} por fuego y sigue sufriendo el efecto negativo.
languages.original_text: This creature has its {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} reduced by −2. Also, at the start of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the creature has to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If passed, it suffers <u>(from 12 to 16)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}, and this {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} is removed. If failed, it suffers <u>(from 16 to 24)</u> fire {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and continues suffering this negative effect.

traits.locale_text: Los PA y PM de la criatura se reducen en −2. Además, al principio de su turno debe realizar una prueba de fortaleza de Resistencia. Si la supera, sufre 12-16 de daño por fuego y este efecto negativo se elimina. Si falla, sufre 16-24 de daño por fuego y sigue sufriendo el efecto negativo.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} dieser Kreatur werden um −2 reduziert. Außerdem muss die Kreatur zu Beginn ihres {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} bestehen. Im Erfolgsfall erleidet sie <u>(12 bis 16)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Feuerschaden{/g} und der {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative Effekt{/g} wird entfernt. Scheitert die Probe erleidet die Kreatur <u>(16 bis 24)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Feuerschaden{/g} und ist weiterhin mit dem negativen Effekt belegt.
languages.original_text: This creature has its {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} reduced by −2. Also, at the start of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the creature has to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If passed, it suffers <u>(from 12 to 16)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}, and this {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} is removed. If failed, it suffers <u>(from 16 to 24)</u> fire {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and continues suffering this negative effect.

traits.locale_text: Bei dieser Kreatur werden die AP und BP um -2 reduziert. Außerdem muss die Kreatur zu Beginn ihres Zuges eine Zähigkeits-Widerstandsprobe bestehen. Bei Bestehen erleidet sie 12-16 Feuerschaden und der negative Effekt wird entfernt. Bei Nichtbestehen erleidet sie 16-24 Feuerschaden und leidet weiterhin unter dem negativen Effekt.

languages.text: Une réduction de 2 s'applique aux {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et aux {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} de cette créature. De plus, au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, elle doit passer un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}. Si elle réussit ce test, elle subit <u>(de 12 à 16)</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}dégâts de feu{/g} et cet {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}effet négatif{/g} est supprimé. Si elle échoue, elle subit <u>(de 16 à 24)</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de feu et cet effet négatif perdure.
languages.original_text: This creature has its {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} reduced by −2. Also, at the start of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the creature has to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If passed, it suffers <u>(from 12 to 16)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}, and this {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} is removed. If failed, it suffers <u>(from 16 to 24)</u> fire {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and continues suffering this negative effect.

traits.locale_text: Une réduction de -2 s'applique aux PA et aux PD de cette créature. De plus, au début de son tour, elle doit passer un test lié à la Résistance. Si elle réussit ce test, elle subit 12 à 16 points de dégâts de feu et cet effet négatif disparaît. Si elle échoue, elle subit 16 à 24 points de dégâts de feu et cet effet négatif perdure.

languages.text: Bu yaratığın {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP'si{/g} 2'şer puan azalır. Ayrıca yaratık, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başlangıcında {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmek zorundadır. Geçerse <u>(12 ila 16)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}ateş hasarına{/g} maruz kalır ve bu {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}olumsuz etki{/g} ortadan kalkar. Geçemezse <u>(16 ila 24)</u> ateş {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarı{/g} alır ve bu olumsuz etkiye maruz kalmaya devam eder.
languages.original_text: This creature has its {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} reduced by −2. Also, at the start of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the creature has to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If passed, it suffers <u>(from 12 to 16)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}, and this {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} is removed. If failed, it suffers <u>(from 16 to 24)</u> fire {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and continues suffering this negative effect.
